title: Skypiea's Connection to the Ancient Kingdom
summary: The revelation that Jaya was launched into the sky 400 years ago has led fans to theorize that this event is connected to the Void Century and the fall of the Ancient Kingdom. The City of Gold may contain important historical records.
fullText: Many fans believe that the Skypiea arc contains crucial information about the Void Century and the Ancient Kingdom. The fact that Jaya was launched into the sky 400 years ago - roughly the same time period as the Void Century - suggests this wasn't a natural occurrence but possibly related to the World Government's actions. Shandora, the City of Gold, may have been home to people who knew too much about the true history, and the Knock Up Stream that launched it into the sky could have been caused by an Ancient Weapon. This would explain why there are Poneglyphs on the island.
author: r/OnePiece Community

source.title: Skypiea and the Void Century Theory

title: Mont Blanc Noland's True Purpose
summary: Some fans theorize that Noland's journey to Jaya wasn't just exploration but a mission to find something specific - possibly information about the Ancient Kingdom or a Poneglyph.
fullText: The revelation that the City of Gold exists and that Noland was telling the truth has sparked theories about his true purpose. Some fans believe Noland wasn't just an explorer but may have been searching for something specific related to the Ancient Kingdom or ancient weapons. His detailed logbook and the emphasis on the skull shape of the island suggest he knew more than he let on. This theory proposes that Noland may have been connected to the D. clan or worked with scholars trying to uncover the true history.
author: One Piece Theory Forums

source.title: Mont Blanc Noland's Hidden Mission Theory

title: The Shandia are Descendants of the Ancient Kingdom
summary: The Shandia's fierce protection of Upper Yard and their ancestral connection to Shandora suggests they may be descendants of the Ancient Kingdom, guarding important historical secrets.
fullText: This theory proposes that the Shandia people are descendants of the Ancient Kingdom and that their 400-year war to reclaim Upper Yard isn't just about land but about protecting crucial historical information. The presence of Poneglyphs in Shandora and the Shandia's determination to protect their homeland at all costs suggests they know something important about the true history. The skull symbol formed by Jaya and Skypiea may be intentional, marking the location as significant to those who understand its meaning.
author: GrandLineReview Community
